content: I was wondering about creating a chatting platform for Logic (preferably in Zulip). In case there already is some, please let me know. By the way, I don't know if there already exists a chatting platform for such discussions. In which case please let me know about it.

Logic as a whole is an enormous field - I don't know if the nice experience of this place can be scaled to that size... Just imagine the length of the side scrollbar. But of course, if you encounter that kind of problems, it means you have succeeded in creating a vibrant place :smile:
